sn22.29:4.2: “Yo, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn22.29:4.3: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn22.29:4.7: yo viññāṇaṃ abhinandati, dukkhaṃ so abhinandati.
sn22.29:4.8: Yo dukkhaṃ abhinandati, aparimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn22.29:4.9: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn22.29:4.10: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
sn22.29:4.14: yo viññāṇaṃ nābhinandati, dukkhaṃ so nābhinandati.
sn22.29:4.15: Yo dukkhaṃ nābhinandati, parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmī”ti.
